description: This file implements a React Hook called useScrollReveal that manages element reveal animations as the user scrolls, utilizing IntersectionObserver and supporting staggered animations, reduced motion preferences, and configurable options.

methods.name: getPrefersReducedMotion()
methods.description: Checks if the user has requested reduced motion, used to disable animations for accessibility.

methods.name: applyStaggerDelays(root = document)
methods.description: Applies staggered delays to child elements within containers marked with a specific data attribute, setting CSS variables for transition delay.

methods.name: useScrollReveal(options = {})
methods.description: A React hook that sets up IntersectionObserver to animate elements with the data-reveal attribute when they enter the viewport, with support for staggered delays and reduced motion.
